column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
"Egypt asaase a hom tsenaa do no do nyɛe no
column3: mma hom nnyɛ: na Keenan asaase a medze hom rokɔ do no do nyɛe no so
column4: mma hom nnyɛ: nkyii so mma hom nndzi hɔn ahyɛdze do."

column2: "Me mbrasɛm na hom ndzi do
column3: na hom nsie m'ahyɛdze
column4: dɛ wobedzi do: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nsie m'ahyɛdze
column3: na me mbrasɛm a sɛ nyimpa yɛ a
column4: obenya nkwa wɔ mu no: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma hom mu biara nnkɔ obiara a ɔyɛ no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn no nkyɛn nnkeyi n'adagyaw do: emi nye EWURADZE."
"W'egya n'adagyaw
column3: mekyerɛ wo na n'adagyaw no
column4: mma nnyi do: wo na nye no; mma nnyi n'adagyaw do."

column2: "Mma nnyi w'egya ne yer n'adagyaw do: w'egya n'adagyaw ara nye no."
"Mma nnyi w'akyerɛbaa a ɔyɛ w'egya ne babaa
column3: anaa wo na ne babaa
column7: mekyerɛ hɔn adagyaw no mma nnyi do."

column2: "Wo babanyin ne babaa n'adagyaw
column3: anaa wo babaa ne babaa dze no
column4: mekyerɛ hɔn adagyaw no mma nnyi do: na hɔndze no ɔyɛ wankasa w'adagyaw."

column2: "W'egya ne yer ne babaa n'adagyaw
column3: nyia w'egya awo no no

column2: "Mma nnyi w'egya n'akyerɛbaa n'adagyaw do: ɔyɛ w'egya no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn no."
"Mma nnyi wo na no nuabaa n'adagyaw do: na ɔyɛ wo na no bɔgyaa a ɔbɛn no."
"Mma nnyi w'egya no nuabanyin n'adagyaw do
column3: mma nnkɔ ne yer nkyɛn: ɔyɛ wo na nuabaa."

column2: "Mma nnyi w'asew n'adagyaw do: ɔyɛ wo babanyin ne yer; mma nnyi n'adagyaw do."
"Mma nnyi wo nua ne yer n'adagyaw do: ɔyɛ wo nua n'adagyaw."
"Mma nnyi ɔbaa bi nye ne babaa hɔn adagyaw do; mma mmfa ne babanyin ne babaa
column3: anaa ne babaa ne babaa nnyi hɔn adagyaw do; wɔyɛ bɔgya a ɔbɛn: ɔyɛ ebusudze."

column2: "Mma mmfa ɔbaa bi nnka n'akyerɛbaa ho
column3: dɛ ɔmbɛyɛ no korafo
column5: nnka kor no ho wɔ no nkwa ber mu."

column2: "Na mma nnkɔ ɔbaa bi nkyɛn nnkeyi n'adagyaw do
column3: aber tsentsen nyina a no ho nntsewee wɔ n'asabu mu no."

column2: "Mma nnye wo nyɛnko ne yer nnda mmfa wo ho nsu mma no
column3: mmfa nngu wankasa nye ɔno ho fi."

column2: "Na mma mmfa w'asefo mu bi ma ɔnnkɛfa gya mu mma Molek
column3: nkyii so mma nnhura wo Nyankopɔn dzin ho: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Mma nnye banyin nnda dɛ mbrɛ enye ɔbaa da: ɔyɛ ekyiwadze."
"Na mma nnye abowa biara nnda mmfa nngu woho fi: nkyii so ɔbaa biara nngyina abowa bi enyim nnda hɔ mma no: ɔyɛ sakasakayɛ."
"Mma hom nngu homho fi wɔ ndzɛmba iyinom mu biara mu: na iyinom nyinara mu na amanaman a murutu hɔn efi hom enyim no dze egu hɔnho fi;"
"na asaase no do egu fi: dɛm ntsi mohwɛ n'emumuyɛ no wɔ do
column3: na asaase no fe no do atsefo no gu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nsie m'ahyɛdze na me mbrasɛm
column3: na mma hom nnyɛ ekyiwadze yi mu biara
column5: ɔhɔho a ɔabɔsoɛ hom mu o:"

column2: "(na ekyiwadze yi nyinara na asaase no do nyimpa a wodzi hom enyim kan no ayɛ
column3: na asaase no do egu fi;)"

column2: "amma asaase no aammfe hom so eenngu
column3: wɔ aber a hom egu do fi no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔfee ɔman a odzii hom enyim kan no."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔbɛyɛ ekyiwadze yi mu biara no
column3: mekyerɛ akra no a wɔyɛ no
column4: wobotwa hɔn efi hɔn man mu egu."

column2: "Dɛm na hom nhwɛ m'ahwɛdze do
column3: na hom aannyɛ atɔrmuadze nkɔnkɔw yi a wodzii hom enyim kan yɛe no mu biara
column4: na hom eenngu homho fi wɔ mu: emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."
